CircularBuffer - Class in task1
This circular buffer of bytes can be used to pass bytes between two threads: one thread pushing bytes in the buffer and the other pulling bytes from the buffer.

connectionAccepted - Variable in class task1.implementation.Rdv
 
createRdv(QueueBroker.ConnectListener, QueueBroker.AcceptListener) - Method in class task4.implementation.Rdv
This function is called by the destination broker (who received the connection request) The function establishes the connection between the two brokers, having the 2 listeners (Connect and Accept) The function is called in the EventPump thread (by AcceptEvent), so no concurrency issues
